## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                       | Type     | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `progress` | `progress` | The current progress as number between 0.0 and 1.0 (equals 100%). | `number` | `undefined` |
